title: Panels, 1725–1750
medium:
Medium: linen, silk, gilded paper wrapped on linen thread
Technique: stenciled and resist dyed; embroidered and couched
description: Landscape with a swirling river, fishermen's nets, river banks with trees and fences, and birds flying over distant waves – all reserved in white on a blue ground. Details embroidered in bright silk floss of orange, green, brown, black and white or couched in gold.

tombstone.epitaph:
Panels, 1725–1750.Medium: linen, silk, gilded paper wrapped on linen thread
Technique: stenciled and resist dyed; embroidered and couched. 1953-168-2-a,b.
